projects.name: SpecKit
projects.summary: A specification-driven development toolkit for AI-assisted software engineering.
projects.details: SpecKit provides templates, workflows, and conventions for capturing requirements, generating implementation plans, and tracking development progress. It integrates with AI coding assistants to enable structured, traceable software development.

projects.name: Blog Platform
projects.summary: A modern blog platform built with Next.js, MDX, and Tailwind CSS.
projects.details: This open source blog platform demonstrates best practices for building content-driven websites with Next.js App Router, MDX content management, and responsive design using Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: CLI Toolkit
projects.summary: A collection of utilities for building command-line interfaces in TypeScript.
projects.details: CLI Toolkit provides argument parsing, interactive prompts, progress indicators, and colorful output formatting for Node.js command-line applications. Built with TypeScript for type-safe development.
